item.title: Fast Walsh–Hadamard Transform
item.description: 导引 满足交换律的运算 \(\otimes\)，序列 \(a, b, c\) 和可逆矩阵 \(H\) 满足 \[ \begin{cases} c_n &= \sum_{p \otimes q = n}a_pb_q\\ \sum_j H_{i, j}c_j &= \sum_pH_{i,p}a_p\sum_q H_{i, q}b_q \end{cases} \] 所以 \[ \begin{aligned} \sum_{j}H_{i, j}\sum_{p, q}[p\otimes q = j]a_pb_q &= \sum_{p, q}H_{i, p}H_{i, q}a_pb_q\\ \sum_{p, q}H_{i, p \otimes q}a_pb_q &= \sum_{p, q}H_{i, p}H_{i, q}a_pb_q\\ H_{i, p\otimes q} &= H_{i, p}H_{i, q} \end{aligned} \] 对于 \(\otimes\) 运算为模意义下加法的情形，可以构造 \(H\) 为范德蒙矩阵： \[ H= \begin{bmatrix}1& 1 & 1& \cdots & 1\\ 1& \omega_n^1& \omega_n^2& \cdots & \omega_n^{n - 1}\\ 1& \omega_n^2 & \omega_n^4& \cdots & \omega_n^{2(n - 1)}\\ \vdots & \vdots& \vdots& \ddots& \vdots\\ 1& \omega_n^{n - 1}&\omega_n^{2(n - 1)} & \cdots & \omega_n^{(n - 1)(n - 1)} \end{bmatrix} \] 它的逆为： \[ H^{-1}=\dfrac{1}{n}\begin{bmatrix}1& 1 & 1& \cdots & 1\\ 1& \omega_n^{-1}& \omega_n^{-2}& \cdots & \omega_n^{-(n - 1)}\\ 1& \omega_n^{-2} & \omega_n^{-4}& \cdots & \omega_n^{-2(n - 1)}\\ \vdots& \vdots& \vdots&\ddots& \vdots\\ 1& \omega_n^{-(n - 1)}& \omega_n^{-2(n - 1)} & \cdots & \omega_n^{-(n - 1)(n - 1)}\end{bmatrix} \] 此时为傅里叶变换。
